meanings.sent1: The vexillaries decorations added a festive touch to the event.

meanings.sent3: During the parade, the vexillaries seemed to dance in the wind.

meanings.sent5: The vexillaries fluttered gracefully in the breeze, catching everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: a group of flags or banners
meanings.sent1: The vexillaries at the entrance welcomed guests to the party.
meanings.sent2: The army marched proudly under the vexillaries of their nation.
meanings.sent3: The vexillaries stood tall and colorful against the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent4: The stadium was filled with vexillaries of all shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent5: The vexillaries lined the street, creating a vibrant and festive atmosphere.

meanings.definition: pertaining to military standards or emblems
meanings.sent1: The vexillaries symbols on their uniforms represented their unit.
meanings.sent2: The general inspected the troops' vexillaries insignias with pride.
meanings.sent3: The vexillaries emblems on the tanks added a touch of elegance to the battlefield.
